name: Deadline (itch)
description:
The game is "not there". It´s your job to make it, before the deadline, with your fellow game developers. Your team consists of three people. The artist, who will use a tablet/mouse as controller, the musician who will use a midi-keyboard as controller, and the programmer who will use the regular keyboard.

The gameplay consists of a mixture of Guitar Hero and a clicker game.

Note: Some kind of midi device is required to play the game.
